slides.title: Performance Evaluation
slides.content:
# Advanced Measurement

## Tools

| Tool | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Balanced Scorecard | 4 perspectives |
| EVA | Economic profit |
| Transfer pricing | Internal |
| Divisional | Performance |

## EVA

```
EVA = NOPAT - (Capital x WACC)

Positive EVA = Value creation
```

## Balanced Scorecard

- Financial
- Customer
- Internal process
- Learning and growth

slides.title: Direct Tax - Corporate
slides.content:
# Paper 7 - DT

## Corporate Tax

| Rate | Applicability |
|------|---------------|
| 25% | Domestic |
| 15% | New manufacturing |
| 22% | Optional (no exemptions) |

## MAT

```
Minimum Alternate Tax
15% of book profit

Applies when normal < MAT
```

## DDT

```
Abolished from 2020

Dividend taxable in hands of recipient
```

slides.content:
# Strategic Tax

## Planning Areas

| Area | Approach |
|------|----------|
| Structure | Entity choice |
| Timing | Deferral |
| Incentives | Utilize |
| International | Treaty shopping |

## GAAR

```
General Anti-Avoidance Rule

Applies if:
- Main purpose is tax benefit
- Creates rights not ordinarily
- Lacks commercial substance
- Abuse of treaty
```

slides.title: GST Refunds
slides.content:
# Refund Process

## Eligible Cases

| Case | Refund |
|------|--------|
| Export | Full ITC |
| Inverted duty | Formula |
| Excess payment | Application |

## Timeline

| Stage | Period |
|-------|--------|
| Application | Within 2 years |
| Processing | 60 days |
| Provisional | 90% in 7 days |

## Formula - Inverted

```
Max = (Turnover x Net ITC / Adj Total Turnover) - Tax Paid
```
